meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>child</kanji> that's <kanji>astray</kanji> is a <vocabulary>lost child</vocabulary>. Help them home, don't invite them into your windowless van, please.
readingMnemonic: The reading for 迷 is an exceptional reading. The ご comes from こ. Think of the まい as the child asking: "Where is <reading>my</reading> (まい) mommy???"
